DOC.brief_summary: To investigate preliminary pharmacokinetics , pharmacodynamics , safety tolerability GW823093 dose 15mg 30mg give daily 7 day Japanese Type 2 diabetes mellitus ( T2DM ) patient .
DOC.brief_title: Study Of GW823093 In Japanese Subjects With Type 2 Diabetes Mellitus
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : T2DM diagnose least 3 month prior Screening fast plasma glucose ( FPG ) level < 280mg/dL Screening visit . Concurrent T2DM therapy : Must diet control OR take 2 oral antidiabetic agent , willing withdraw treatment 2 week prior first dose . Exclusion criterion : Must major illness diabetes
